# Blood Blaze (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Fire Spells|fire]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 2]], [[1st Level Antipaladin Spells|Antipaladin 1]], [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Magus Spells|Magus 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Witch Spells|Witch 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]], [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Advanced Race Guide, pg. 143

The target gains a 5-foot-radius aura that causes the blood of creatures in that area to ignite upon contact with air. Any creature (including the spell’s target) within the aura that takes at least 5 points of piercing, slashing, or [[S3.1A-C - Universal Monster Rules A-C (Bestiary 6 Apx)|bleed]] damage from a single attack automatically creates a spray of burning blood. The spray strikes a creature in a randomly determined square adjacent to the injured creature. The spray deals 1d6 points of fire damage to any creature in that square, and 1 point of splash damage to all creatures within 5 feet of the spray’s target, including the target of this spell. A creature can only create one spray of burning blood per round. Creatures that do not have blood (including oozes and most constructs and [[S3.2 - Creature Types (Bestiary 6 Apx)|undead]]) do not create blood sprays when attacked.
